globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 2
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You arrive at Anchorhead near dusk. Imperial forces have held the town for weeks. You must find and defeat Captain Terro to free the city from his martial law.

Alliance intel warns you that Terro is most dangerous when flanked by his personal security force. These warnings aren't to be taken lightly, but you must press forward, no matter the danger.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked.

eventActions.theText:
You encounter a patrol harassing civilians. With no provocation, a trooper starts firing in the streets. Unwilling to watch, you intervene.

{-} Deploy the <color="red">Dewback Rider</color> to the red highlighted space.
A nearby security station controls the door locks.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
The security station controls the door locks.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal to deactivate it.

eventActions.theText:
As long as the dewback rider is around, you can't go looking for Terro. You must get rid of him first.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal to deactivate it.
{-} When the <color="red">Dewback Rider</color> is defeated and the terminal is deactivated, all doors open.
{-} The mission will progress when the doors open.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
Terro curses as he's forced to retreat. It's unclear whether he's more upset with you, or with the failure of his own men. It will take time for Anchorhead to return to normal, but the healing can begin.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
"Was that the best the Alliance could send?" Terro mocks as you flee from your failed coup. Having inadvertently reinforced his reign of fear, you worry for the future of Anchorhead.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The Empire receives <color="red">Captain Terro</color> (Wasteland Enforcer) as a villain.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Dewback defeated
globalEvents.eventText: The dewback rears, throwing off its rider, and stomps off.

globalEvents.name: Terminal disabled
globalEvents.eventText: You quickly deactivate the security station.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal to deactivate it.

globalEvents.name: Take on the Cavalry
globalEvents.eventText: The doors open into a large, dusty plaza.

eventActions.theText: "l was wondering how long it would take for you Rebel filth to show up." Terro laughs as he turns his dewback to face you.
"Come on then, " he calls to his men. "Blasters up, boys!"
Block line of sight to <color="red">Captain Terro</color>.

{-} Whenever a Stormtrooper group is activated, <color="red">Captain Terro</color> readies.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Captain Terro</color> is defeated.

{-} Whenever a Stormtrooper group is activated, <color="red">Captain Terro</color> readies.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Captain Terro</color> is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Stormtrooper 1 activates
globalEvents.eventText: The stormtroopers advance, coordinating their assault with their captain.
